name: The Fight Of Technology (DT2 PP3) *OLD*
description:
In 2022, a military hacking device was released to the public, but it turned phones into your enemies! Everyone thought it was a joke, since nobody would normally release military files onto the internet. The president tried to ban it, but nobody listened. Now, find out who is behind this in...

THE FIGHT OF TECHNOLOGY!

This is a school project, BTW.

Made with RPG Maker VX Ace Lite! (Finally got the full, though!)
